description.title: Football Clothing
description.lfht: From training pitch to terrace, football clothing is a key part of the game. At Decathlon, you'll find a range of clothing covering replica kits through to training kit for warm and cold weather. From shirts and shorts to hats and socks, get kitted out from head to toe.

seo.title: Football Clothes for Men, Women, Boys & Girls | Decathlon UK
seo.description: All the kit you need to train for or play the beautiful game in Decathlon's football clothing range. Available online and in-store. Shop now to enjoy free, next day click & collect and 365 days return.

data.title: Football Clothing | Surfooter
data.body:
Clothing and football have long been intertwined, but here at Decathlon we’re not kitting you out in the classics for the terraces, we’re kitting you out to excel on the pitch. In our range, you’ll find football clothes for men, women and kids. Kit out yourself or your local team with clothing including breathable football shirts, football shortsandfootball socks ready for match day.

Beyond matchday clothing, you’ll also find a range of football training kit, ideal for training through summer or winter.

WATER BOTTLES, FLASKS AND PROTEIN SHAKERS

reinsurancePushServices.modalContent:
You will receive a confirmation email once your product arrives in store. Please wait until you receive this before visiting stores.

You have 7 days to collect your standard C&C order and 2 days for Click & Collect 1 hour.

Please bring your order number (GB123...) and photo proof of ID

Click & Collect 1 hour is only available during store opening times

Collect your parcel from over 600 Asda locations using our CLICK & COLLECT with ASDA service. 
With late openings, safe parking and simple tracking CLICK & COLLECT with ASDA service makes it convenient to pick up your parcel from your local ASDA store
 
*Availability depends on the dimensions of items in your basket. Please check at the checkout

warrantyMessages: 5 years
5 years for the frame and 2 years for parts.
10 years
Lifetime warranty on the frame, 2 years on the fork, 2 years on peripheral components.
Frame, handlebar, stem, lifetime guarantee, 2 years for the fork and peripheral components

Frame, stem, and handlebars are guaranteed for life
The fork is guaranteed for 5 years
Frame, handlebar, stem, lifetime guarantee, 2 years for the fork and peripheral components
Lifetime warranty on the frame, stem and handlebar
Lifetime (frame, stem, handlebar). Availability of spare parts: 2 years.
for life (frame, stem, handlebars, rigid fork). Find out more about the bike guarantee.
Lifetime warranty on the frame, handlebar and stem. 5-year warranty on the fork
